property.name: BEFORE_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_NEW
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is created. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_OPEN
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is opened. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE_AS
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE_AS
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is saved under a new name. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_SAVE_A_COPY
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_SAVE_A_COPY
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a copy of a Document is saved. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_REVERT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_REVERT
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is reverted. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: BEFORE_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched before a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: AFTER_CLOSE
property.shortdesc: Dispatched after a Document is closed. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.

property.name: fullName
property.shortdesc: The full path to the DocumentEvent, including the name of the DocumentEvent.

property.name: eventType
property.shortdesc: The name of the event.

property.name: target
property.shortdesc: The target of the event.

property.name: currentTarget
property.shortdesc: The current propagation target of the event.

property.name: eventPhase
property.shortdesc: The current propagation phase of the event.

property.name: bubbles
property.shortdesc: If true, the event supports the bubbling phase of propagation.

property.name: cancelable
property.shortdesc: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target can be canceled.

property.name: timeStamp
property.shortdesc: The time the event was initialized.

property.name: propagationStopped
property.shortdesc: If true, propagation of the event beyond the current target has been stopped.

property.name: defaultPrevented
property.shortdesc: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target has been canceled.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the DocumentEvent.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the DocumentEvent &#40;a Application or Document).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the DocumentEvent within its containing object.

property.name: userInteractionLevel
property.shortdesc: Controls the display of dialogs and alerts during script processing.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: stopPropagation
method.shortdesc: Stops propagation of the event beyond the current target.

method.name: preventDefault
method.shortdesc: Cancels the default behavior of the event on its target.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the DocumentEvent.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
